text: Hajjbe kayekati masa ache subidita. Esaba mase ye loka hajjbera paripurna niyata karabe, tara pakse stri'o sathe nirabharana ha'oya jayeja naya. Na asobhana kona kaja kara, na jhagara-bibada kara hajjbera se'i samaya jayeja naya. Ara tomara yakichu satkaja kara, allaha to janena. Ara tomara patheya sathe niye na'o. Nihsandehe sarbottama patheya hacche allahara bhaya. Ara amake bhaya karate thaka, he bud'dhimanagana! Tomadera upara tomadera palanakartara anugraha anbesana karaya kona papa ne'i.
